attributes.action: Ban sleeping in the house of commons and house of lords. This a place of work.
attributes.background: Many times MPs and Lords are spotted sleeping setting debates, meetings and gatherings in the houses of parliament. This is a place of work and sleeping at work is gross misconduct. This is serious breach of coduct and trust in these people who supposedly have our interests at heart

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178539

We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or the House of Commons are responsible for. We can't accept petitions calling on the House of Lords to take action.
